Text:
^ What he said.

The first question in any murder investigation is and always will be: Que Bono! Who benifits?

Every crime that was ever solved asked that question first and foremost. Now look at Iraq, look at the American bases and check the big pipeline they're guarding. Now notice where that pipeline leads AND WAKE THE FUCK UP!

Sorry, sorry ... Still ... it's just so goddamned obvious isn't it?

What a lecture :P
I wonder anyone would really read that..
What a load of old shit, 'Truth of 9-11', yeah right.
